actionName: Explain the 'cash cow' role to the organization (compulsory)
Adopt efficiency philosophy aligned to 'cash cow' status
Aggressively pursue intellectual property rights
Aggressively build legal department to defend litigation
Develop in-house leaderhip program with major university
Top leadership travel rules symbolically revised to cut costs
Executive bonus move to 20% base pay maximum
Executive base pay revision : 50% function, 50% corporate
Planning & budgeting assumptions given 'performance' focus
Focus Balanced Scorecard on efficient 'performance'
Revise compensation programs to reward efficiency by function
Bring focus to effects of Government regulation and build lobbying capacity
Adopt 'management by walking around' philosophy
Develop Internet-based, market research program
Introduce 'Agile Marketing' Program
Develop advertising approach based on price
Introduce Digital Marketing concept
CONTRACT with OUTSIDE social media company
Program to involve leadership in front line customer relations
Smart Decisions program uses web data for improved selling
Upgrade of the customer management system
Customer profitability study proposed to eliminate unprofitable accounts
Start negotiations with Value Added Resellers (VARS) to cut costs
Salesforce training program upgrade
Develop call centres to deal with VARS requests
Major push to reduce warranty costs
Support operations restructured to reduce costs
Business customer support training moved to the Web
Move consumer support operations to outside call centre suppliers
Move all staff product and support training to the Web
Work with suppliers on 6 sigma programs
Work with suppliers on 'Green' program
Shift to new (total) enterprise systems: major installation
Introduce 'hackathon' approach to process improvement
Continue process re-eingineering and codification
Security and privacy focus following breach
Install Knowledge mgmt. systems
Promotion of continuous improvement ethos
Maintenance management program installed
Focus on effectiveness of transactional IT infrastructure
Invest in creation of full data warehouse
Invest heavily in security to contain cyber-risk
All offerings to be assessed by Green Initiative Team
Mandate all offerings to be passed before Legal Dept before project milestone discussions
Introduce 3M-style innovation budget
Increase developer customer needs awareness through customer visits
Defend suits over patents usage by pirates
Product developer compensation tied to new product success in market
Agile development model in software introduced
Introduce concept of co-development
Build and maintain an organization
Hire members of the Senior Team
Acquire start-up/growth funding from LegacyCo
Set up shared service agreement for accounting and HR
Access 'outside' resources
Build a strategic pitch for Visionary acquisition
Develop compensation arrangement that reconcile LegacyCo and NewCo
Undertake extensive market research using agency resources
Internal group discussions building market size and structure scenarios
Develop a market positioning that distinguishes your offering from the firm's historical offerings
Develop a market positioning that distinguishes you from competitive set and reference competitor(s)
Massive salesforce-driven campaign to drive sales as far and fast as possible, denying oportunity to competitors (size of salesforce?)
Develop elevator pitch and sales story giving a  compelling reasons to buy
Use sales personnel with indepth industry experience
Tightly focused sales campaign seeking testimonials
Build/maintain strong social media presence to drive word-of-mouth testimonials
Build project management skills to support integration of offering into customer operations
Seek technically-strong 3rd party sales/distribution partners that can implement the offering rapidly
Develop 'playbooks' that talk to the offering in use and how to integrate it
Seek mass, very low-cost distribution channel
Install organization structure to form/maintain market partnerships
Set up/maintain warranty terms
Set up/maintain support call centres with suitable support tools
Train 3rd party distributors to handle support issues
Set up self-help, FAQ systems
Business decision on level of support and performance parameters
Maintain relationship with outsourcing partner to support scalability
Maintain supply chain logistics systems
Introduce enterprise management system
Outsource wage and hiring tasks to parent company adminstration for fixed fee of 5% of wage bill
Maintain adminstration in house requiring building HR, accounting etc. departments

Focus on building functionality to support a 'whole offering'
Focus on developing multiple offering configurations
Focus on offering stabilization and predictability of performance
Focus to a standardized, 'productized' version of the whole offering that covers all eventualities
Focus resources on invention of new functionality
Focus on extreme ease of installation and ease of use
Development focus on cost reduction even at expense of functionality and inferior offering
